content: As you get close to the edge of the cliff, you'll find another clearing with a rock in the middle. This is the third Poison Chief in the region.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Poison_Chiefs.md', within the main section titled 'Poison Chiefs', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find Poison Chief 3'.
The content is as follows:
As you get close to the edge of the cliff, you'll find another clearing with a rock in the middle. This is the third Poison Chief in the region.
